name: MAGE-KESHIFT
description:
This was TOTALLY not made by FartFish (https://fartfish.itch.io) if you enjoyed this you totally shouldn't follow FartFish (https://fartfish.itch.io) on his itch page (https://fartfish.itch.io). This game is ineligible for any prizes for the Boss Rush Jam (certainly not because any of the judges are working on it or anything)

MAGE-KESHIFT is a game about a little mage who uses boss attacks as his own makeshift attacks. You can only use the boss' attacks to attack them, so be sure to be quick on your feet and react as fast as possible!

CONTROLS

WASD -- Movement

LCLICK -- harness the power of the orb (orb cannot attack on its own -- you must use what you see around you to attack bosses)

Release LCLICK exactly when the orb fully charges (yellow flash) -- PERFECT SHOT!!!!

CREDITS

Director, Programming, Art, Game Design -- FartFish FlatulentTuna (Adam Chean-Udell) 

Game Design & QA -- SwagShaw

Music -- Cweed

Music -- Maxie
